data.title: Cecilia Cheung Gives Birth to a Baby Boy
data.text:
Hong Kong actress and singer Cecilia Cheung on Thursday night gave birth to her first child, a baby boy, fathered by local super star Nicholas Tse.

Patrick Tse, father of Nicholas told the media at a local hospital that the baby was very healthy and that both mom and child were doing great, Sina Entertainment reported.

The report revealed that Nicholas Tse was accompanying Cheung from the very beginning.

Cheung first dated Nicholas Tse in early 2002. But they broke up later when Tse got back with his ex-girlfriend singer Faye Wong.

In July, 2006, they admitted getting back together. And around two months later, they announced they had married in a secret wedding ceremony in the Philippines.
